DataElement.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age._A less severe form of mania characterized by elevated mood, hyperactivity, and grandiosity. In contrast to mania, these symptoms do not cause significant impairment of the individual's productivity at work, or social and family relationships._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.

ReferenceDocuments.name: A questionnaire to measure hy
ReferenceDocuments.description: A questionnaire to measure hypomania (hypomanic episode), which is characterized by periods of persistently elevated, expansive, or irritable  mood lasting throughout at least 4 days and which can include inflated self-esteem, increased distractibility, talking and flight of ideas, and decreased need for sleep

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
